SQL.LOAD: SELECT claim_issue_id, answer_id, supports_claim_id, answer_description, answer_value, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, claim_issue_response_id FROM elp_claim_issue_response WHERE claim_issue_response_id = :claim_issue_response_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT claim_issue_id, answer_id, supports_claim_id, answer_description, answer_value, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, claim_issue_response_id FROM elp_claim_issue_response WHERE claim_issue_id = :claim_issue_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_claim_issue_response SET claim_issue_id = :claim_issue_id, answer_id = :answer_id, supports_claim_id = :supports_claim_id, answer_description = :answer_description, answer_value = :answer_value, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE claim_issue_response_id = :claim_issue_response_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_claim_issue_response ( claim_issue_id, answer_id, supports_claim_id, answer_description, answer_value, created_by, claim_issue_response_id ) VALUES ( :claim_issue_id, :answer_id, :supports_claim_id, :answer_description, :answer_value, :created_by, :claim_issue_response_id )
